charaepi_general_talk_search_2060_m23_1/:
You want to save Celebi, don’t you? Then hurry
up and search for clues!

Team Break really bugs me for some reason!
We can’t let them have Celebi!
I’ve got a good feelin’ that we can use you.
You’re looking for Celebi, huh? What for?

Celebi is known as a forest deity. If you people
are looking for it, that can only mean...

you’re upstanding folks who want nothing but
peace for the forest!

It’s nice to meet upstanding folks who want
nothing but peace for the forest!
Come on! Spit it out! Where’s Celebi?
No way!
There’s no way I’d tell bad guys like you!
We have to help him!
Hold on! We can’t win in a head-on fight.
What should we do?
Don’t ask me. We can’t win in a head-on fight.

Don’t you remember what Meowth said? They
have us outnumbered.
I only see that one guy over there right now.
Then this should be a piece of cake!

Wh-what do you all want?! I won’t go easy on
you if you’re here to mess with me!
It’s not nice to gang up on a guy like that!

All right, my little twerpsie-poo. Tell us where
Celebi is, pleeease.

We aren’t planning anything bad, you know. We
just want to help Celebi.
C-Celebi went that way!
Please save Celebi! Some bad guys are after it!
There are bad guys everywhere, huh?

They’re getting in the way of our plan. Let’s show
these so-called bad guys how out of their league
they really are!

Let’s find some super-good dirt for digging a
pitfall trap!

You can make quick work of any opponent if you
just drop them down a pitfall!

Maybe we should dig a pitfall trap for Celebi...
Oh, it can fly. I guess that wouldn’t work.

Hey! Get back to work! You ain’t got time to be
slackin’ off!

My Nincada burrowed into the ground and won’t
come out.
Lemme talk to ’em. Let’s see here...

It says it’s lost all its confidence from losin’
all the time.

Nincada grow up in the dirt, so this is sorta like
homesickness or somethin’.

I bet it would regain its confidence if it won
a Pokémon battle. Why don’t you fight it and
lose, Meowth?

Oh, please! Would you? C’mon, Nincada, it’s time
for a battle!

Wow! That experience made Nincada evolve
into Ninjask!

Hey, wait! Now you’re getting a little TOO
fired up!

Not too hard, not too soft. This is good dirt. Perfect
for a pitfall trap, wouldn’t you say?
All right! This is our spot! You help too, twerp!
Heave ho! Heave ho! Heave ho!

Now all we gotta do is lure Team Break this way
and make ’em fall down this hole!
Look! It’s Celebi!
Hey, Team Break! Over here!

Why, you—! How could I fall for such a
classic trap?

My Pokémon is a real gourmand! It seems to like
the taste of the soil here.
Eat up so you can evolve all the way to Tyranitar!

That’s right, eat up! That’ll save us the trouble
of having to dig pitfall traps!
Hey! Why’d you stop eating?

It says it’s just eatin’ a little bit of this good soil
’cause it doesn’t wanna evolve.

It’s sayin’ this lady here probably won’t wanna
pat it on the head anymore if it evolves
into Tyranitar.

It says that the ground near that lady is probably
perfect for a pitfall trap.
Wowee! Be still, my beatin’ heart!

You’re better lookin’ than any Mythical Pokémon,
toots! How’s ’bout we go get a coffee together?
Hey! What are you doing with my little Purrloin?!
How ’bout ya mind yer own business!
What?! A talking Meowth?!
Ohhh! That’s too cute! I can’t take it!
She says her Trainer’s crazy about cat Pokémon.

The ground here’s too hard. I think we’ve gotten
pretty far away from the good dirt.
The ground here’s no good for pitfall traps.

Look for good dirt that would make Pokémon
wanna dig right in.
